name: Erection Day
description:
Slavic Game Jam Submission. Jam's theme was Close Enough, that's why the game is called Erection Day rather than Election Day ;).

It's Erection Day! use a Mop to throw people out of the building to increase Your Party chances of winning!
Rotate the Mop using the Mouse. Hold LMB to move towards Your mouse Cursor.

Have Fun!
